puzzle.title: The Fire's Witness
puzzle.intro: A profound individual, dedicated to uncovering the ultimate reality, embarked on a journey of spiritual discovery. Their unwavering conviction led them to challenge established norms, facing immense trials that tested the limits of faith. This soul's story is a testament to divine protection and guidance.
clues: I was blessed with a unique title from my Lord, signifying a deep and special bond.
My early life was spent among a people who bowed down to crafted images, but my heart yearned for the One True God.
I observed the celestial bodies, the sun, moon, and stars, contemplating their rise and fall, concluding they could not be my Lord.
In an act of defiance against widespread polytheism, I confronted the false deities, leaving a solitary, larger one intact as a silent accuser.
My challenge to idolatry led to a severe punishment, as I was condemned to be cast into a raging inferno.
Yet, by the command of my Creator, the intense flames transformed into a source of coolness and safety, preserving my life.
puzzle.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًۭا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
puzzle.verse: They said, "Construct for him a structure [i.e., furnace] and throw him into the burning fire." (37:97)
